title: Lauren Conrad releases new capsule that 'mirrors her life milestones'
text:
She started her LC Lauren Conrad for Kohl's line ten years ago.

And to celebrate the milestone, Lauren Conrad is putting out a new collection that will 'mirror her life milestones.'

The 33-year-old revealed on Tuesday that what started as a clothing line became a lifestyle brand.

Marking all the moments: Lauren Conrad revealed that she was celebrating her 10 years with Kohl's by releasing an anniversary capsule collection that 'mirrors her life milestones'

'We really started as a clothing line and have become a lifestyle brand. It’s been really nice to grow along with this brand. They really mirrored my life milestones,' she revealed in a press release.

'We did a maternity line when I was pregnant. Whenever there’s something happening in my life, they’re like, "Let’s talk about it, it should be reflected in the line," which is really cool.'

And while the capsule will mark their ten years together working on the range, more is still to come.

So many changes! 'We really started as a clothing line and have become a lifestyle brand. It’s been really nice to grow along with this brand. They really mirrored my life milestones,' she revealed in a press release (pictured 2014)

'I think as I continue to grow and have changes in my life that will continue to be shown throughout the line.'

'The 10th anniversary collection is inspired by everything that this line stands for. You’ll see that through the color story and the embellishment and the fabrics and silhouettes. It’s really a concentrated collection of our aesthetic and I’m very excited about. It really feels like a celebration of this brand.'

Lauren has gone through a lot of changes within the past 10 years. The star has been married and as of last week, is a now a mother-of-two.

10 years on: 'The 10th anniversary collection is inspired by everything that this line stands for. You’ll see that through the color story and the embellishment and the fabrics and silhouettes. It’s really a concentrated collection of our aesthetic and I’m very excited about. It really feels like a celebration of this brand' (pictured in 2010 at the start of her collaboration)

The former Hills star announced her new arrival on Instagram with a painted portrait of their family which she made herself.

'Our sweet baby boy, Charlie Wolf Tell, has arrived!' she wrote on her personal Instagram account.

Lauren discussed earlier in the year about how her second pregnancy had been more of a challenge as now she has a toddler to chase after.

She found love: Lauren began dating musician William Tell in February 2012. They became engaged in October 2013 and married in September 2014 (pictured one month after their wedding in October 2014)

He's here! The former Hills star announced her new arrival on Instagram last week with a painted portrait of their family which she made herself

'With Liam, we didn't decide [on a name] until he was born. We had options, but we liked the idea of meeting our baby first,' she told People.

'The biggest thing [with this pregnancy] is that I already have a child this time. I’m definitely more tired. Pregnancy is much more difficult when you have a two-year-old running around.'

Lauren began dating musician William Tell in February 2012. They became engaged in October 2013 and married in September 2014.

The couple welcomed their first son, William 'Liam' Tell in July 2017 and Charlie Wolf Tell in October 2019.
description: Lauren Conrad revealed that she was celebrating her 10 years with Kohl's by releasing an anniversary capsule collection that 'mirrors her life milestones.'
